name: Flicker (itch) (JonahSagers)
description:
My first game!  Well, not my first to itch but it was the first one I ever made.

Everything in the game is dark, except for you, the lightbulb.  Light a path through the world, because you won't be able to see anything outside of your halo.

- WASD to move

- Space to jump

That's it!
